alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 12:47PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bladen, southeastern Robeson and northern Columbus Counties through 115 PM EST... At 1247 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ammon to near Bladen Community College to Boardman. Movement was east at 95 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Rowan, Bladenboro, Boardman, Carvers, Bladen Community College, Abbottsburg, Lisbon, Ammon, Lagoon, Elkton, Emerson, Council, Kelly, Ruskin, Evergreen, Butters, Clarkton, White Lake and East Arcadia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for southeastern North Carolina.
